Mustwatch.. beautiful..Unique... mesmerizing..a whole dictionary seems to be helpless to describe this particular movie.TUM BIN  clearly shows that how decently a love story can be said without any melodramatic conversations.No extra emotion,no overacting,no flirt,no kiss,no wink..even in the whole movie, there is hardly any scene where Sekhar and Priya touch themselves..just imagine!!..so strange!!! Yet the chemistry between them has been grown so beautifully that it forms spiritual bonding between them.Songs are amazing and perfectly placed.The locations are eye pleasing.Title bgm along with koi Fariyad tune are just haunting,ear pleasing as well as heart warming.All the actors have done full Justice to their characters.They are the reasons why each moment is so lovely as well as lively.
For me , 
#TUMBIN# is the ULTIMATE...ONCE IN LIFE TIME..so don't miss.

The best movie in Bollywood....a real life basic emotions and full of love...üòçüòçüòçit has the speciality to attract people..I know most people want to watch their favorite characters like srk or salman khan etc.This movie may not have those actors and also doesn't have those romantic scenes and unfortunately people want those things.
May be that's why this movie did not collect more ratings but for me it is 11 out of 10.101 out of 100...This is a movie that everyone can watch with their family members even it is a love story..This movie is a star and it is so much much much special for me... Millions of childhood memories with this movie. Truly amazing and I loved the soundtrack. Jagjit ji and Sonu ji were so peaceful to listen. I truly wish the actors to make a reprise edition of the film together so that many like me can be nostalgic oncd again:)

LOVE- that's unconditional - unintentional and unbiased. It always finds it's way to everyone life.
This movie is true gem in-terms of story - feelings- emotions of love and after all mind blowing MUSIC of all time.
Don't miss if you love emotional and romantic movies with good script.

A movie beyond words to describe what actually LOVE is..what emotions do value in love....so much unsaid emotions related to it of mine...watched 95 times still never bored.. speechless for the heart warming songs location emotions unconditional love story each n everything every bit of it is speechless that straightly touches to the soul giving me goosebumps everytime i watch it...one n only this is my movie for this lifetime..till m alive m gonna watch it..i live in this movie
